Summary Strength Highlights 
C/C++ (Visual Studio 2010/2012), Python, Multimedia, Video Coding, Digital Image processing. 
 
Qualifications 
‧	Familiar with the Media System Design and Video Codec Algorithm including the color theory, lossless and lossy compression, entropy code, scalar quantization, image resolution, JPEG/JPEG2000, MPEG-2, H.264, graphics compression. 
‧	Familiar with Digital Image processing method such as image enhancement, denoising, edge detection, digital half-toning, spatial warping, texture classification and image resizing. 
‧	Familiar with Pattern Recognition Algorithms and Machine Learning including decision tree, linear classifier, minimum-distance-to-class-means classifier, Perceptrons, Support Vector Machine(SVM), Bayes classification, Principal Components Analysis, Clustering, cost function analysis and Optical Character Recognition(OCR). 
‧	Familiar with Algorithm and Data Structure including greedy, divide and conquer, dynamic programming, and data structure: hash, queue/stack, tree, linked list. 
‧	Familiar with C in algorithm and data structure. 
‧	Familiar with C++ in Object-oriented programming and image and video processing. 
‧	Familiar with JAVA in image compression and algorithm of video codec. Summary Strength Highlights

Summary Highly skilled engineer with more than 4 years’ experience developing software in Linux and MS Windows environments using structured programming techniques, as well as, Object Oriented approach using languages like C, C++ and Java and scripting languages like Perl, Python, Bash, csh and ksh. Also more than 4 years’ experience developing embedded hardware using HDLs (Hardware Description Language) and HVLs (Hardware Verification Language) like VHDL, Verilog, SystemVerilog and e Specman. These developments have been made inside high-tech and banking companies like Intel, Scotiabank, Hewlett-Packard, and University of Guanajuato.
